name: Synthwave Detective (BanjoCollie)
description:
Traverse cyberspace to bring an end to a notorious cyber-terrorist, using sonar-like pulses to reveal the terrain around you. Enemy programs roam the halls, blind to your presence, but they too can detect your sensor pulses. Use speed and cunning to reach your destination at the end of the Heart Drive, and secure victory for your employers.

Made as a 48 hour game jam with Daniel Fabres, Meghan Jonas, Seamus Neill and Jon Shoberg for the 2017 Global Game Jam.
